effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 438,373 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 225,884.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 9,417 for 15 sec.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Iridal, the Earth's Master

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
